snippet.title: Let's Play Wanderlust Travel Stories
snippet.description:
Once upon a game... We wanted to play something that would make us feel what we feel when we travel to distant places, and that’s how Wanderlust Travel Stories was born. In this let’s play Artur from Different Tales shows you one of the journeys and explains the ins and outs of the gameplay, as well as what made us make these design choices.

In the full game you’ll visit Thailand, Bangladesh, Congo, Spain, Antarctica and other places that pulled on our heartstrings. It’s not about fighting, it’s about taking in the world. Enjoy!

Follow us on:

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/differenttales/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/differenttales
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/differenttalesgames/

See the website - http://wanderlust.voyage
